Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: Jesse R. Clark
Reviews.Content: Wife and I both bought them new about 8 months ago. I returned mine within 30 days for a replacement due to randomly shuting down. My wife has had to hard reset hers a couple times now because it wouldn't funtion properly or take updates. Have never been able to get either phone to link up with any computer reliably (rare occasions it will). Phone is very slow to react about 1/3 of the time, I've missed calls because it took so long to react to me hitting the answer button- heaven help you if your playing a game or something when someone calls. Like trying to program a shuttle launch on a windows 386. Things that help-I've eliminated allmost all "apps", cleared cache, I've found shutting the phone down and restarting helps, however sometimes I can't get it to restart- will just sit at the samsung screen for hours without proceding till I pull the battery and try again. Put it this way, I'm considering getting a land line again so I can be sure to get calls. So just buy a sting and a cup or anything else. Just waiting till I can get a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SPH-M910 - Avoid at all costs
Reviews.Author: M. Schutkowski
Reviews.Content: I can't recommend this phone for more than overpriced paperweight.Battery life is about 2 to 3 hours, if you're lucky.Battery will run very hot at times.Very slow processing times between screens / apps.Randomly turns itself off when extended / closing the keyboard.Randomly turns itself off when just simply sitting there.God forbid you have to take a phone call when doing anything else with this thing - better hope your caller waits 15 to 20 rings, so the phone itself has time to catch up and get you to a screen where you can actually answer a call.I used to love Samsung - my first 2 cell phones with them were amazing - the last two - have been absolutely horrid.

Reviews.Title: It Was Okay
Reviews.Author: Pablo4
Reviews.Content: It Came In On A Good Day About Two Weeks The Only Thing That Bordered Me Was It Said (Gray) And It Came In Pink That Made Me A Little Mad But Im Pretty Sure A Cover Will Do Just Fine So Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Phone but...
Reviews.Author: Damien Viens
Reviews.Content: Great Phone but..  With android phones you become instantly addicted to the market.. plenty of free stuff to try..  Unfortunately the phone only has a limited amount of space.  Other than that, the camera is great, easy to navigate, easy to text on both the qwerty and screen.  Other than the space, Its a great phone.

Reviews.Title: SamSung Intercept M910
Reviews.Author: bigdaddy
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy my intercept from amazon but when I seen this phone on this site, on sale haha 104,99 (WHICH IS NOT A SALE)I had to gave my 2cent. First of all this phone suckssss. I purchase mines july of 2010 from sprint was a upgrade. Buying this phone was more like a DOWNGRADE. This is my 5th replacement in 2yrs. Cuts off when sliding the screen down, freezes up all the time, cuts off just sitting on the table, react time when answering the phone is extremely slow so your guaranteed to miss your call (HOPE IT WAS'NT IMPORTANT) touch screen stop working and wouldn't let me unlock my phone, take FOREVER for phone to turn on and boot up so you can make a call (HOPE YOUR LIFE NOT IN DANGER) battery life sucks. I wish I could say one nice thing about it BUT i can't. All phone company's are making these phones more EXPENSIVE & CRAPPY.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: This phone turns off, freezes, vibrates and anything you don't want it to do at any given time, horrible choice

Reviews.Title: bad phorne
Reviews.Author: Anthony Crain
Reviews.Content: - cannot download apps- have to reset phone to get messages, answer phone calls, vibration kills battery fast- no connection inside stores- text messaging has messages appearing before new messages

Reviews.Title: Good and Fully Functional
Reviews.Author: BetaBlack
Reviews.Content: The low cost lured me in but the phone is fairly old and can't handle too much activity b/c it continuously freezes and I only have 3 downloaded apps

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: Tweet
Reviews.Content: You deserve 5 stars because you saw a problem with the customer and offered to fix the problem and I commend you for that!!!! Please keep displaying that kind of customer service!!!!

Reviews.Title: Small challenges
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Summers
Reviews.Content: I like the flip up keyboard, but I'm still getting used to the touch screen.  Don't like having to take my gloves off when I'm outside because there isn't enough heat with gloves on to operate keys.  The phone is also sluggish when it's cold. Phone slippery and difficult to open keyboard without hitting other keys

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: this phone really suck however we were a day past the return policy so could'nt send back-bummer stuck with a phone we cant use

Reviews.Title: Broken phone
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I just finally tried switching over to this phone and couldn't it's defective after checking out battery also shows water damage so over $50 bucks for a broken phone as a single mother who struggles financially I had hoped the phone would be good at a better price then store but I'm left with having to just spend more money in the store thanks to seller Just_Deals

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it !
Reviews.Author: dirrahh
Reviews.Content: It shuts down with the slightest touch. Its really not worth 20 dollars! It can only hold 1 or 2 games at a time. I wouldnt reccomend it .

Reviews.Title: ANDROID SMART PHONE
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Libasora
Reviews.Content: RECEIVED PHONE AND IT WORKED FOR 2 DAYS BEFORE IT WOULD AUTOMATICALLY TURN OFF, FREEZE IN MID TEXT, DIAL ETC.  ON A NUMBER OF OCASSIONS THE PHONE WOULD DIAL A NUMBER AND NO IT WASN'T A BUTT DIAL BECAUSE THE PHONE WAS SITTING ON THE MANTLE.

Reviews.Title: wrks
Reviews.Author: mary shafer
Reviews.Content: works great. i would purchase again from this place.  very happy with my purchase. it is well worth my money

Reviews.Title: Great data phone w/ Virgin Mobile plan, but almost useless as a phone in low reception areas.
Reviews.Author: WalksDogsHerdsCats "Cb"
Reviews.Content: Great and affordable Android gadget for data w/ Virgin Mobile 300min/ unlimited data plan, $25/mo. But almost useless as a phone in low reception areas, which is everywhere around here. Plus, in a call to say, AT&T; because you have to use the # on the keyboard, not a separate dial pad, the other end won't hear them most the time, so forget calling a major company, including Virgin Mobile from this phone, Or ever setting up or checking your voice mail from this phone, because you cannot enter a password. This was not a problem when this was a 2G phone, I still had a dial pad on the front screen then, but it disappeared with the 3G update. And oh, yes, Samsung has announced that this phone is never going to 4G, so soon it will be obsolete....It is a solid, drop-able phone. Buy extra batteries, because in low reception areas you will need one every couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: Can't recommend this phone for anybody.
Reviews.Author: ScottP
Reviews.Content: This phone is great if you're looking for a small, slow phone that drains the battery in no time.  Signal strength is also terrible, but I cannot confirm whether it's the phone or the crappy Sprint service.I wouldn't have got this phone, but when it first came out, it got decent reviews, but after I had it a few months, I went back and looked again and found mostly dissatisfied reviews.  Wish I had seen those before I ended up with this piece of junk.Stay away!!!

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE PHONE
Reviews.Author: K. Futrell
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but problems out of this phone from the start. About a week after I got this phone it started freezing up on me and I would have to take the battery out to be able to restart the phone. My phone freezes like this at least once a day. I cannot upload any photos from this phone to the internet nor can I send pictures via email with this phone which I HATE. The battery life is about 3-4 hours and thats with average use. If you use the phone more your battery life will not last more than 2 hours. These are common problems with this phone as two of my friends have this exact phone and have the exact problems out of theirs as well. My old phone which was NOT a Andriod Smartphone was A LOT better than this dumbphone. I would NOT recommend this phone to anyone even as a last resort.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: NoFear52003
Reviews.Content: Phone has to be restarted and battery taken out multiple times a day. Can barely be used at all. Not satisfied

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Cornelius  Crews
Reviews.Content: Phone came as described and in good condition it is a phone that packs a good punch and lasts for the price of it I wouldn't get a better one.
